org.apache.felix.dm.runtime.api

Interface ComponentFactory


  • public interface ComponentFactory
    When a Component is annotated with a DM "Component" annotation with a "factoryName" attribute, a corresponding ComponentFactory is registered in the OSGi service registry with a @link ComponentFactory#FACTORY_NAME servie property with the Component "factoryName" value.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ComponentInstance newInstance(java.util.Dictionary<java.lang.String,?> conf)
      Instantiates a Component instance.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        ComponentInstance newInstance(java.util.Dictionary<java.lang.String,?> conf)
        Instantiates a Component instance. Any properties starts with a "." are considered as private. Other properties will be published as the component instance service properties (if the component provides a services).
        Parameters:
        conf - the properties passed to the component "configure" method which is specified with the "configure" attribute of the @Component annotation.
        Returns:
        the component instance.
